welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villeparisis, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving major international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals serving a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login and have limited access time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
